mapper.select: WITH RankedRooms AS ( SELECT r.acc_id, r.ro_price, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY r.acc_id ORDER BY r.ro_price ASC) AS rn FROM room r JOIN accommodation a ON r.acc_id = a.acc_id WHERE a.regCheck = 'Y' ), UniqueAccIDs AS ( SELECT acc_id, ro_price FROM RankedRooms WHERE rn = 1 ORDER BY ro_price ASC LIMIT 8 ), RankedImages AS ( SELECT ai.acc_id, ai.acc_image, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ai.acc_id ORDER BY ai.acc_id) AS img_rn FROM acc_image ai ) SELECT u.acc_id, ri.acc_image FROM UniqueAccIDs u JOIN RankedImages ri ON u.acc_id = ri.acc_id WHERE ri.img_rn = 1
